subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Missing two of the stars who carried them to the N.C.A.A. championship game last season, the Wolverines put their trust in a pair of young players: Glenn Robinson III and Nik Stauskas.
snippet: Missing two of the stars who carried them to the N.C.A.A. championship game last season, the Wolverines put their trust in a pair of young players: Glenn Robinson III and Nik Stauskas.
